verbose_text: In addition to the activation by HSF1, Hsp90beta is up-regulated by the IL (interleukin) -6 transcription factors NF-IL6 (nuclear factor for IL-6) and STAT-3 (signal transducer and activator of transcription 3) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: up-regulated by the IL (interleukin)-6 transcription factors NF-IL6 (nuclear factor for IL-6) and STAT-3
